# target

**Instance Property**

The object that implements the action method.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor weak var target: AnyObject? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The object in this property must implement the method specified by the [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSGestureRecognizer/action] property.

## Accessing the Target and Action

- **action**: The action method to call when the gesture is recognized.

items.description: The action method to call when the gesture is recognized.
